title: The Love Community | Giveaways | Friendly

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Title is self explanatory, we are an Oceanic based League Of Legends community striving to spread love around the game.
We are a small community of about 50 people and looking for expand. We welcome all people of all nations to join us however!

If you're looking for a community, feel free to join the Discord and come and hang out! 

{{item:3067}}
